text: Jamie Roy Vincent (18 June 1975 â€“ 18 January 2022) was an English professional footballer. He played as a defender. His career began in 1993 and he retired in 2012. He was known for playing with Bournemouth, Huddersfield Town, Portsmouth, Swindon Town, Walsall and Aldershot Town. Vincent died from a heart attack in Reading, Berkshire on 18 January 2022, at the age of 46. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Footballers from London Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:People from Reading, Berkshire Category:Sportspeople from Berkshire Category:Crystal Palace F.C. players Category:Portsmouth F.C. players Category:AFC Bournemouth players
title: Jamie Vincent
